message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I've set the opening price at $1,300,000.  I believe this reflects its true value and the benefits it will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,000,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,000,000 is significantly below what I can accept. This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident it will generate substantial returns for you. How about we meet in the middle at $1,175,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,100,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference and settle at $1,137,500?  This feels like a fair compromise that recognizes the immense value this product brings.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1,125,000 for the product.
